product.title: BESTOYARD 20Pcs Hot Curler Accessories Silver Metal Hair Clips for Styling Salon Use 11.8X0.75X0.08In
product.description:
Description

Are you looking for hot curler clips? Easy to use, separate a small section of slightly damp or dry hair. Place the end of hair section around roller and wind up to scalp. Hot Roller Clips can be applied for curling hair or in the salon. You have thin or thick long hair, it will give you the curls, waves, and fullness you want.-hairdressing tool

Features

-Color:Silver
-Material:Metal 
-Size:7.50X1.90X0.20cm/2.95X0.75X0.08in
- Made of sturdy metal materials, these -hot roller clampshot curler clips are durable and not easily deformed, can be used for longtime.
- Quick heating, saving time and allowing you to complete your curling hairstyle faster. Give you more convenience.-hairdressing styling tools
- U-shaped clip could securely hold the hair stably, preventing slippage and ensuring curling effect.-u-shaped clips
- Suitable for most sizes of electric hot rollers, allowing users to choose the appropriate size according to needs.-volumizing hair clips
- Replacement clip design allows for easy replacement of different sizes of rollers to meet different styling needs.-hair roller clips hot
